  • Method Details

    • getLectionByHashtag

      public String getLectionByHashtag(String hashtagtoSearch)
      This function searches for a specific hashtag in a string of hashtags and returns a corresponding message.
      Parameters:
      hashtagtoSearch - A String representing the hashtag to search for in the "hashtags" variable.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String message. If the hashtag to search is found in the "hashtags" variable, the method will return the "lection" variable. Otherwise, it will return the message "No se encontro el hashtag" (which means "Hashtag not found" in Spanish).

    • getWorker

      public String getWorker()
      The function returns the name of a worker.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String value which represents the worker's name.

      public String getId()
      This function returns the value of the "id" variable as a string.
      Returns:
      The method `getId()` is returning a `String` value, which is the value of the variable `id`.

      public boolean getApproveStatus()
      This function returns the approve status as a boolean value.

    • getIsPublished

      public boolean getIsPublished()
      The function returns a boolean value indicating whether an item is published or not.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a boolean value, specifically the value of the variable "isPublished".

      This function returns the publish date of an object as a Calendar object.

      The method `getPublishDate()` is returning a `Calendar` object, which represents the date and time of publication.

      public void setIsPublished(boolean newPublishedStatus)
      This function sets the published status of an object.
      Parameters:
      newPublishedStatus - a boolean value that represents the new published status that we want to set for an object. If it is true, it means the object is published, and if it is false, it means the object is not published. The method sets the value of the isPublished instance variable of the object to the

    • setApproveStatus

      public void setApproveStatus(boolean newStatus)
      The function sets the approve status to a new boolean value.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - a boolean value that represents the new status to be set for the approveStatus variable. If newStatus is true, it means the approval status is set to approved, and if it is false, it means the approval status is set to not approved.

    • setApproveDate

      public void setApproveDate(Calendar approvedDate)
      This function sets the publish date of an object to a new calendar date.
      Parameters:
      approvedDate - A Calendar object representing the new publish date to be set for an instance variable called publishDate.
